data.name: ReadCashReceipt
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CASH_RECEIPT_ID, RECEIPT_DATE, REFERENCE_NUMBER from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID, COLLECTION_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_DATE from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptEvent
data.value: select top(1) CST_IDENTIFIER, CREVENT_ID from CKT_CR_EVENT where (CREVENT_ID = @creventId) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptSourceType
data.value: select top(1) CR_SRCE_TYPE_ID, CODE from CKT_CRSRC_TYPE where CR_SRCE_TYPE_ID = @crSrceTypeId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptType
data.value: select top(1) CRTYPE_ID from CKT_CR_TYPE where CRTYPE_ID = @crtypeId

data.name: ReadCollection
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, DISB_DT, ADJ_IND, CONCURRENT_IND, DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, CAR_ID, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT, COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CREATED_TMST, OB_TRN_AMT, DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, DIST_MTD, PGM_APPLD_TO, APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, PGM_ST_APPLD_TO from CKT_COLLECTION where (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (OTY_ID = @otyId) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and ( (COLL_ID > @collId) or (COLL_ID = @collId) ) order by COLL_ID

data.name: ReadCollectionAdjustmentReason
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID, OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_CD from CKT_COLL_ADJ_RSN where OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID = @obTrnRlnRsnId

data.name: ReadCsePerson1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, ORGANIZATION_NAME from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePerson2
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (TYPE = @type) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadLegalAction1
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, TYPE, COURT_CASE_NO, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where (LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId) and (STANDARD_NO = @standardNo)

data.name: ReadLegalAction2
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, TYPE, COURT_CASE_NO, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, LGA_ID, PRIM_SEC_CD, ORD_TYP_CD, LGA_IDENTIFIER, LAD_NUMBER from CKT_OBLIGATION where (@dtyGeneratedId = DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (OB_ID = @obId)

data.name: ReadObligationObligationTransactionDebtDetail1
data.value: select T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T1.PRIM_SEC_CD, T1.ORD_TYP_CD, T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.LAD_NUMBER, T2.OB_TRN_ID, T2.OB_TRN_TYP, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.DEBT_ADJ_IND, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.DEBT_TYP, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T3.DUE_DT, T3.BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.ADC_DT, T3.RETIRED_DT, T3.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T3.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T3.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OB_TRN T2 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE') and (T2.DEBT_TYP = 'D') and (T1.OB_ID = @obId) join CKT_DEBT_DTL T3 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T3.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T3.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt) and (T3.DUE_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and ( ( (T3.DUE_DT = @dueDt) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID >= @obTrnId) ) or (T3.DUE_DT < @dueDt) ) order by T3.DUE_DT desc, T2.OB_TRN_ID

data.name: ReadObligationObligationTransactionDebtDetail2
data.value: select T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T1.PRIM_SEC_CD, T1.ORD_TYP_CD, T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.LAD_NUMBER, T2.OB_TRN_ID, T2.OB_TRN_TYP, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.DEBT_ADJ_IND, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.DEBT_TYP, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T3.DUE_DT, T3.BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.ADC_DT, T3.RETIRED_DT, T3.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T3.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T3.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OB_TRN T2 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE') and (T2.DEBT_TYP = 'D') and (T1.OB_ID = @obId) join CKT_DEBT_DTL T3 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T3.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T3.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.DUE_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and ( ( (T3.DUE_DT = @dueDt) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID >= @obTrnId) ) or (T3.DUE_DT < @dueDt) ) order by T3.DUE_DT desc, T2.OB_TRN_ID

data.name: ReadObligationTransaction
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OB_TRN_ID, OB_TRN_TYP, OB_TRN_AMT, DEBT_ADJ_TYP, DEB_ADJ_DT, CREATED_TMST, CSP_SUP_NUMBER, CPA_SUP_TYPE, OTY_TYPE, DEBT_ADJ_PROC_DATE, RSN_CD from CKT_OB_TRN where (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OB_TRN_TYP = @obTrnTyp) and (OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadObligationTransactionRln
data.value: select ONR_GENERATED_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OBG_GENERATED_ID, OTR_P_TYPE, OTR_P_GENERATED_ID, CPA_P_TYPE, CSP_P_NUMBER, OBG_P_GENERATED_ID, OB_TRN_RLN_ID, CREATED_TMST, OTY_TYPE_PRIMARY, OTY_TYPE_SECONDARY from CKT_OB_TRN_RLN where (OTR_P_GENERATED_ID = @otrPGeneratedId) and (OTR_P_TYPE = @otrPType) and (OBG_P_GENERATED_ID = @obgPGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE_PRIMARY = @otyTypePrimary) and (@cpaPType = CPA_P_TYPE) and (@cspPNumber = CSP_P_NUMBER) and (CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst) order by CREATED_TMST desc

data.name: ReadObligationTransactionRlnRsn
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID, OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_CD from CKT_OB_TRN_RLN_RSN where OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID = @obTrnRlnRsnId

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) T1.DEBT_TYP_ID, T1.DEBT_TYP_CD, T1.DEBT_TYP_CLASS, T1.SUP_PRSN_REQ_IND from CKT_OB_TYPE T1 join CKT_OBLIGATION T2 on (T1.DEBT_TYP_ID = T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_ID = @obId) and (@cpaType = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T1.USER_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T1 join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T2 on (T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate) join CKT_ASSGN_OBG T3 on (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE = T3.OSP_DATE) and (T2.ROLE_CODE = T3.OSP_CODE) and (T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID = T3.OFF_ID) and (T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID = T3.SPD_ID) and (@obgId = T3.OBG_ID) and (@cspNo = T3.CSP_NO) and (@cpaType = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (@otyId = T3.OTY_ID) and (T3.REASON_CODE = 'RSP') and (T3.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T3.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate)
